name: Devil Dice (itch)
description:
Welcome to Balaam's Casino.

As a dealer,  manipulate dice rolls in order to keep the customers on flow.

The Dealer ALWAYS wins,  as long as they want to.

-----------------------------------

a game by

Paolo "Gleetch" Conte

Lorenzo "Logalpix" Galasso

-----------------------------------

CONTROLS

LEFT MOUSE: Interact

R KEY: Restart Level

ENTER: Swith Fullscreen/Windowed Mode
